item.title: Phobos and Deimos, Mars moons
item.description: Introduction Recently, I have stumbled upon an article about Mars moons. To be honest, I didn’t know that Mars has any moons at all until I read the article. Anyhow, after reading the article, I decided to write a short blog post to introduce Mars moons for those, like me, who don’t know about them. Mars moons Mars has two moons named Phobos and Deimos. Phobos is the bigger one and Deimos is the smaller.
